title: weird stuff with ip
body:
the support part of the LoL website has gone tits up (not able to log in for whatever reason) so i'll post here

I finished up a normal's game and i went to get a  a mystery champion shard, i have 1712 IP  but it says that i cant buy it because i dont have enough IP.

help please?

replies.body: apologies if a riot dev sees this, for some reason the IP counter displayed a wrong number, just re-logged in
IP can lose sync sometimes, though rare.  It's been more prevalent recently with the updated client, but relogging or swapping back to the legacy client can fix it up.  Glad all is well now!
